click_the_plus_button_to_add: 點擊「添加物品」按鈕開始
previous_level_must_be_between: 前置等級必須在 {min} 到 {max} 之間
target_level_must_be_between: 目標等級必須在 {min} 到 {max} 之間
checked_nodes_indicate_which_neural_heli: Checked nodes indicate which Neural Helix nodes you want to unlock. The planner will calculate materials needed for all selected nodes.
